m_szDocTitle: Kia confirms first global market electric car
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Kia confirms first global market electric car South Korean brand announces at CES a fully-electric car will be launched this year. January 8 2014 Kia technology revealed at CES 2014.  Kia technology revealed at CES 2014.  Kia technology revealed at CES 2014.  Kia technology revealed at CES 2014.  of Kia has confirmed it will launch its first global market fully-electric car later this year. The South Korean car maker announced a suite of new infotainment technologies under the UVO banner at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas, including a specific system
